response.overview: The more thorough bare-bottom spanking which the Roue team have yet filmed, and all of it captured in this  sparking spanking video! The wretched Carol Ellis is awash with tears before the headmaster is halfway  through her preliminary spanking, her bottom glowing with the heat of a totally genuine punishment. And  there's no doubt about the tears they're real too!  With her bottom still throbbing from the Headmaster's palm-prints. Carol is shooed away to the upstairs  room where she and her friend Julie Brooks are to be bent over for their canings. The Headmaster comes up and  sends Julie for the cane, spanking while Julie tries to find the required cane. At last it is found, and  Julie's knickers come down too for the first time of dozens of solid thwacks across her wriggling cheeks.  Carol weeps no less copiously than she did downstairs, and is rather more squirmy-bottomed. A splendid tape,  particularly if its caned bottoms you want to see!
response.title: First Week of Term
